name: Lao Huo Tang 老火汤 - Rivervale Plaza SengKang

reviews.text:
I am really hesitant to leave this review but I had to. I am a frequent customer, been served by a lady who always wears a black mask and never greeted customer, wait for customer greets her instead and always frowned when I was just ordering my food. Once she rejected my coins and took my big note, just to return me with even more coins and waved angrily wanted me to leave.
My pig stomach soup only had one gingko today. While when I was served by another lady, I got a very satisfying amount of gingko. If I had not been served by other people, I would assume the food is always so pathetic. Really ruins my appetite sometimes because of this.
Love the service by laobanniang though whenever she's around. But I dread ordering from the stall because of this staff.
Dont really like to leave a review, but my pig trotter vinegar and watercress soup, the pork were not fresh and it has a weird taste. Please improve on food quality.

I ordered the food via grab food on the 11 August and that was the only meal my siblings and I ate on that day. We had a really bad diarrhoea the following day and was sick (: please do a quality check on the food
